title: The Shape of plastics
creator_credit: British Information Services, Michael Clarke and Alan Pendry
brief_description: Shows the role of research chemist in the formulation of new polymers; takes a quick look at plastic production in the processing plants, and dazzles the viewer with colourful examples of the varied consumer goods. Bronze Medal, Barcelona, 1963; Gold medal, Bilboa, 1963.
